statements: UPDATE rewards_points SET points_earned = points_earned + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;

UPDATE rewards_points SET purchase_amount = 100.0, earn_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE reward_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
